about.heading: About Us
about.text: Founded in 2020, Cuarteto Metanoia is a string quartet dedicated to excellence in chamber music performance. We bring together four passionate musicians committed to sharing the beauty of classical and contemporary repertoire with audiences across Colombia and beyond.
